content: blue sky fibers - happy holidays complimentary pattern the royal oak cowl is cozy and cabled made with one 150 gram hank of woolstok and will keep you warm on the coldest night experience * intermediate materials * woolstok worsted 100% fine highland wool 150g/370yds 1 hank * size 8 5mm 24″ circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge finished measurements * circumference 30″ * height 14½ color shown * wild thyme no 1306l
